short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arkansas Public School students to automatically populate their school and username to assist in logging into Home Access Center.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assist Students in logging into Home Access Center by automatically selecting their district and entering their username.
